SpotRate class

Source: R/spotrate-class.R
spotrate-class.Rd

The SpotRate class abstracts the interst rate and has methods to handle many calculations on it.

Details

The SpotRate class fully specifies spot rates. It has:

  • the spot rate values which are numeric values representing the rate.

  • the compounding regime that specifies how to compound the spot rate. This is a Compounding object.

  • the daycount rule to compute the compounding periods right adjusted to the spot rate frequency.

  • the calendar according to which the number of days are counted.

The SpotRate class is a numeric, that represents the interest rate and that has the slots: compounding, daycount and calendar.

For example, an annual simple interest rate of 6%, that compounds in calendar days, is defined as follows:

sr_simple <- spotrate(0.06, "simple", "actual/360", "actual")
sr_simple

## [1] "0.06 simple actual/360 actual"

actual/360 is the daycount rule and actual is the calendar.

Differently, an annual compound interest rate of 10%, that compounds in business days according to calendar Brazil/ANBIMA is

sr_disc <- spotrate(0.1, "discrete", "business/252", "Brazil/ANBIMA")
sr_disc

## [1] "0.1 discrete business/252 Brazil/ANBIMA"

The calendar slot is a bizdays calendar.

An $100,000 investment in an instrument that pays that interst rate for 5 years has the future value.

100000 * compound(sr_disc, term(5, "years"))

## [1] 161051

for the simple interest rate we have

100000 * compound(sr_simple, term(5, "years"))

## [1] 130000

SpotRate objects can be created with vectors

sr_vec <- spotrate(abs(rnorm(10)), "discrete", "business/252", "Brazil/ANBIMA")
sr_vec

##  [1] "2.4074949 discrete business/252 Brazil/ANBIMA"
##  [2] "0.1536445 discrete business/252 Brazil/ANBIMA"
##  [3] "0.7272605 discrete business/252 Brazil/ANBIMA"
##  [4] "0.1665265 discrete business/252 Brazil/ANBIMA"
##  [5] "0.1888282 discrete business/252 Brazil/ANBIMA"
##  [6] "0.8619113 discrete business/252 Brazil/ANBIMA"
##  [7] "0.3456210 discrete business/252 Brazil/ANBIMA"
##  [8] "1.1039747 discrete business/252 Brazil/ANBIMA"
##  [9] "0.4384621 discrete business/252 Brazil/ANBIMA"
## [10] "1.7957924 discrete business/252 Brazil/ANBIMA"

and can be put into a data.frame

data.frame(spot_rate = sr_vec)

##                                        spot_rate
## 1  2.4074949 discrete business/252 Brazil/ANBIMA
## 2  0.1536445 discrete business/252 Brazil/ANBIMA
## 3  0.7272605 discrete business/252 Brazil/ANBIMA
## 4  0.1665265 discrete business/252 Brazil/ANBIMA
## 5  0.1888282 discrete business/252 Brazil/ANBIMA
## 6  0.8619113 discrete business/252 Brazil/ANBIMA
## 7  0.3456210 discrete business/252 Brazil/ANBIMA
## 8  1.1039747 discrete business/252 Brazil/ANBIMA
## 9  0.4384621 discrete business/252 Brazil/ANBIMA
## 10 1.7957924 discrete business/252 Brazil/ANBIMA

once in a data.frame, dplyr verbs can be used to manipulate it.

require(dplyr, warn.conflicts = FALSE)

## Loading required package: dplyr

data.frame(spot_rate = sr_vec) |>
   mutate(comp = compound(spot_rate, term(5, "months")))

##                                        spot_rate     comp
## 1  2.4074949 discrete business/252 Brazil/ANBIMA 1.666664
## 2  0.1536445 discrete business/252 Brazil/ANBIMA 1.061362
## 3  0.7272605 discrete business/252 Brazil/ANBIMA 1.255738
## 4  0.1665265 discrete business/252 Brazil/ANBIMA 1.066284
## 5  0.1888282 discrete business/252 Brazil/ANBIMA 1.074731
## 6  0.8619113 discrete business/252 Brazil/ANBIMA 1.295636
## 7  0.3456210 discrete business/252 Brazil/ANBIMA 1.131665
## 8  1.1039747 discrete business/252 Brazil/ANBIMA 1.363328
## 9  0.4384621 discrete business/252 Brazil/ANBIMA 1.163566
## 10 1.7957924 discrete business/252 Brazil/ANBIMA 1.534771

SpotRate is numeric, so it executes arithmetic and comparison operations with numeric objects.

data.frame(spot_rate = sr_vec) |>
   mutate(
     new_spot_rate = spot_rate + 0.02,
     check_gt_1pp = spot_rate > 0.01,
     check_gt_nsr = spot_rate > new_spot_rate
   )

##                                        spot_rate
## 1  2.4074949 discrete business/252 Brazil/ANBIMA
## 2  0.1536445 discrete business/252 Brazil/ANBIMA
## 3  0.7272605 discrete business/252 Brazil/ANBIMA
## 4  0.1665265 discrete business/252 Brazil/ANBIMA
## 5  0.1888282 discrete business/252 Brazil/ANBIMA
## 6  0.8619113 discrete business/252 Brazil/ANBIMA
## 7  0.3456210 discrete business/252 Brazil/ANBIMA
## 8  1.1039747 discrete business/252 Brazil/ANBIMA
## 9  0.4384621 discrete business/252 Brazil/ANBIMA
## 10 1.7957924 discrete business/252 Brazil/ANBIMA
##                                    new_spot_rate check_gt_1pp check_gt_nsr
## 1  2.4274949 discrete business/252 Brazil/ANBIMA         TRUE        FALSE
## 2  0.1736445 discrete business/252 Brazil/ANBIMA         TRUE        FALSE
## 3  0.7472605 discrete business/252 Brazil/ANBIMA         TRUE        FALSE
## 4  0.1865265 discrete business/252 Brazil/ANBIMA         TRUE        FALSE
## 5  0.2088282 discrete business/252 Brazil/ANBIMA         TRUE        FALSE
## 6  0.8819113 discrete business/252 Brazil/ANBIMA         TRUE        FALSE
## 7  0.3656210 discrete business/252 Brazil/ANBIMA         TRUE        FALSE
## 8  1.1239747 discrete business/252 Brazil/ANBIMA         TRUE        FALSE
## 9  0.4584621 discrete business/252 Brazil/ANBIMA         TRUE        FALSE
## 10 1.8157924 discrete business/252 Brazil/ANBIMA         TRUE        FALSE

Note

The SpotRate objects are annual rates.
